appDesc.message: 携帯端末・スマートフォンの動作をシミュレートする開発補助ツールです

donateTitle.message: Find this useful ? Consider making a donation

donationPart1.message: Donations are welcome. They also help me continuing work on it.

donationPart2.message: You can use the Paypal button below to donate the amount you want.

donationPart3.message: For every donation, I will send you a thank you note, so make sure you enter a valid e-mail address ; for big donations, I will send you a little drawing !

donationThanks.message: Thank you for considering a donation !

exportDownloadReady.message: User-Agents successfully exported. Click here to download the exported file.

exportLabel.message: Click here to export User-Agents listing to a text file.

importLabel.message: Click the button below to import User-Agents from a previously exported text file.

uaConfirmDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete $key$ ?
